title: The Githyanki Warrior
content:
yanki Creche.

We discovered that the artefact's prisoner is the figure in our dreams. We cannot kill them without losing our protection against the Absolute's voice. We should enter the portal and return to the creche.

Speak to Lae'zel about the events at the Githyanki Crèche

Lae'zel was unable to fulfil Queen Vlaakith's command. We should talk to her.

Give Lae'zel time to think.

We failed to extract the mind flayer parasite and made an enemy of Queen Vlaakith. Lae'zel need time to consider
